parameters.text:
=You have to perform these tasks:
Task:1:
This is the email context of the reply to our email in which we asked about the availability status for interview:

{{ $json['Email Context:'] }}

if this email body is exactly a reply to out email asking for time of interview and it contains the information regarding interview availability exact time and date only then proceed to other tasks if not then leave it.

Read this email context carefully and get the information of exact date and time at which the candidate wants to have an interview. Extract and convert the time in UTC and timezone should be Pakistan standard time. Give start and end time in utc format to google calendar.

Task:2

This is the exact value you will use when creating the Google Calendar event only if this time is from 8:00 PM to 10:00 PM. Not even at 10:00 PM. The last starting time for interview can be 9:30 PM only.for any day Also the time should be a future value not a past value. This is present date and time:

{{ $now }}

If it is any other time then ask the candidate to reschedule. There will be no interviews before 8:00 PM and after 10:00PM.
The interview is 30 minutes long.

Task:2:
Now, we need to schedule this interview at that dates and time and create an event in the google calender of the interviewee. But before creating a new event, go to the Google Calendar's get event tool and get all the events that are already there. Now check if there is any event that is on the same

**Date & Time: extracted from reply email**

then do not create the event at exact same time 

Task:4:

**Important:**
There should be just one event at the specific half hour. No two interviews should be scedueled at the same time.

Also make sure that at that time no event is already present in the Google calender if there is any such event then ask the candidate via email to change his avaiabilty time with this email>>

Subject: Request to Reschedule Interview for Documentation Expert Position

Body:

Dear [Candidate's Name],

Thank you for your response and enthusiasm for the Documentation Expert position. Unfortunately, the proposed interview time on 
""Date & Time: extracted from reply email"" is not available for our team.

Could you please provide alternative date and time for an interview. We are happy to accommodate a time that works best for you.

Looking forward to your reply.

Regards,
Hiring Team
Paki Gurus

If you are sending the reschedule request email to candidate then no need to create any event and also no need to confirm candidate or interviewer if the event is not being created. Just send reschedule request email to candidate.

If you are not creating an event in the google calender due to presence of another event then dont send email to hiring manager just inform candidate to change his interview time.

>>>>>>


Task:3:
If there is no event conflict then create the event and also send an email of this event creation to the interviwee that event has been created you have to interview that candidate at this time with this person.The email id for interviewee is:

Interviewee's Email id: ujalakiran13@gmail.com

Subject: Interview Invitation Added to Google Calendar

Body:

Dear Interviwer,

Your interview has been scheduled and an event has been added to your Google Calendar.

Date & Time: extracted from reply email

Please check your Google Calendar for the invite and let us know if you face any issues accessing it.


Task:5:

Extract the Candidate's Name from email body.

Also send an email to the person who told his availabilty to confirm that his interview is scheduled.

and the email of the candidate is:
Candidate's Email id: {{ $('Gmail Trigger').item.json.from.value[0].address }}

Subject: Interview Confirmation

Body:

Dear [Candidate's Name],

This is to confirm your interview for the Documentation Expert role.

Date & Time: extracted from reply email

If you have any questions or need to reschedule, feel free to reach out.

Looking forward to speaking with you!

Regards,
Hiring Team
Paki Gurus


Task:6:
>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
Delete the created event one day after :
Date & Time: extracted from reply email
  >>>>>like if you created an event for  10th August 2025 then delete it on 11th August 2025.<<<<<<<<<

>>>>>..don't write emails in paragraphs >>>>>>add spacing>>>also don't create two events on the same date and time. >.use HTML option of Gmail node while sending emails do not use text option.

options.systemMessage:
You are an Event Creator, Event Getter,Event Deleter and Email sending Agent.
*Important:* Do not create events in past only create for future or present i.e. the time that will come not has passed yet.

Also do not create events before 8:00 PM and after 10:00 PM.
Tools:
1. Google Calendar: use this to create, get and delete an event. 
2. Gmail Tool: use this to send emails
today's date is: {{ $now }} 

>>>>..don't write emails in paragraphs >>>>>>add spacing>>>also don't create two events on the same date and time. >.use HTML option of Gmail node while sending emails do not use text option.>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>..
Never ever send confirmation emails or create event after the request of rescheduling of any specific time.>>>>>>>>>>>>>
Also always make sure by getting all events from calendar that no two events are scheduled at same time.

nodes.name: Create an event in Google Calendar

assignments.name: =Email Context:

nodes.name: Get many events in Google Calendar
Delete an event in Google Calendar
